welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marina del Rey, a charming coastal city known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and stunning harbor views. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city's unique charm during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at LAX, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A popular terminal for international flights, with a wide range of amenities.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The largest and most modern terminal at LAX, serving many international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A busy terminal with a mix of domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A terminal with a focus on domestic flights, with a variety of food and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A recently renovated terminal with a variety of amenities and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A modern terminal serving domestic and international flights, with many dining options.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A domestic terminal with a variety of amenities, including a spa and fitness center.

wifi.note: Limited to 45 minutes per session, with option to purchase premium access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Gates 1-5
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for domestic flights operated by JetBlue and Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Gates 6-10
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for international flights operated by Southwest Airlines and Allegiant Air.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.
